Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Statuette of Harpocrates
Description: Naked male figure, depicted with the left arm hanging alongside the body and the right arm bent with the hand at the mouth, leaning against a dorsal pillar. The head is lost, all that remains of it is the rolled up end of the "lock of youth" resting on the right shoulder.
